OptionDisplayGroup.name: groupDenseOres
OptionDisplayGroup.Description: Distribution options for Dense Ores Ores.

OptionChoice.name: enableDenseOres
OptionChoice.Description: Should Custom Ore Generation handle Dense Ores ore generation?

Choice.description: Use Custom Ore Generation to handle Dense Ores ores.
Dense Ores ores will be handled by the mod itself.

Choice.Description: Large veins filled very lightly with ore.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.
Simulates Vanilla Minecraft.

Choice.description: Coal is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: dnsoCoalFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Dense Ores Coal distributions

OptionNumeric.name: dnsoCoalSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Dense Ores Coal distributions

Choice.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.
Simulates Vanilla Minecraft.

Choice.description: Iron is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: dnsoIronFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Dense Ores Iron distributions

OptionNumeric.name: dnsoIronSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Dense Ores Iron distributions

Choice.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.
Simulates Vanilla Minecraft.

Choice.description: Gold is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: dnsoGoldFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Dense Ores Gold distributions

OptionNumeric.name: dnsoGoldSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Dense Ores Gold distributions

Choice.Description: Single vertical veins that occur with no motherlodes.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.
Simulates Vanilla Minecraft.

Choice.description: Redstone is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: dnsoRedstoneFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Dense Ores Redstone distributions

OptionNumeric.name: dnsoRedstoneSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Dense Ores Redstone distributions

Choice.Description: Short and sparsely filled compound veins containing one material inside another.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.
Simulates Vanilla Minecraft.

Choice.description: Diamond is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: dnsoDiamondFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Dense Ores Diamond distributions

OptionNumeric.name: dnsoDiamondSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Dense Ores Diamond distributions

OptionChoice.name: dnsoLapisLazuliDist
OptionChoice.Description: Controls how Lapis Lazuli is generated

Choice.Description: Single vertical veins that occur with no motherlodes.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.
Simulates Vanilla Minecraft.

Choice.description: Lapis Lazuli is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: dnsoLapisLazuliFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Dense Ores Lapis Lazuli distributions

OptionNumeric.name: dnsoLapisLazuliSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Dense Ores Lapis Lazuli distributions

Choice.Description: Short and sparsely filled compound veins containing one material inside another.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.
Simulates Vanilla Minecraft.

Choice.description: Emerald is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: dnsoEmeraldFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Dense Ores Emerald distributions

OptionNumeric.name: dnsoEmeraldSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Dense Ores Emerald distributions

OptionChoice.name: dnsoNetherQuartzDist
OptionChoice.Description: Controls how Nether Quartz is generated

Choice.Description: Large veins filled very lightly with ore.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.
Simulates Vanilla Minecraft.

Choice.description: Nether Quartz is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: dnsoNetherQuartzFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Dense Ores Nether Quartz distributions

OptionNumeric.name: dnsoNetherQuartzSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Dense Ores Nether Quartz distributions

Substitute.name: dnsoOverworldBlockSubstitute0
Substitute.Comment: The global option deferredPopulationRange must be large enough to catch all ore clusters (>= 32).

Veins.name: dnsoCoalVeins
Veins.Description: Large veins filled very lightly with ore. Because they contain less ore per volume, these veins are relatively wide and long. Mining the ore from them is time consuming compared to solid ore veins. They are also more difficult to follow, since it is harder to get an idea of their direction while mining.

Cloud.name: dnsoCoalCloud
Cloud.Description: Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore. These are huge, spanning several adjacent chunks, and consequently rather rare. They contain a sizeable amount of ore, but it takes some time and effort to mine due to low density. The intent for strategic clouds is that the player will need to actively search for one and then set up a semi-permanent mining base and spend some time actually mining the ore.

Veins.name: dnsoCoalHintVeins
Veins.Description: Single blocks, generously scattered through all heights (density is about that of vanilla iron ore). They will replace dirt and sandstone (but not grass or sand), so they can be found nearer to the surface than most ores. Intened to be used as a child distribution for large, rare strategic deposits that would otherwise be very difficult to find. Note that the frequency is multiplied by ground level to maintain a constant density, but not by ore frequency because it is assumed that the frequency of the parent distribution will already be scaled by that.

StandardGen.name: dnsoCoalStandard
StandardGen.Description: A master preset for standardgen ore distributions.
